name: reporter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 a person whose job is to discover information about news events and describe them for a newspaper or magazine or for radio or television
Examples
She bluffed the doorman into thinking that she was a reporter.Now we're going live to our reporter in Washington for up-to-the-minute news on the crisis.A large crowd of reporters collected outside the prime minister's house.The reporters wouldn't stop hounding her.The US lodged a formal protest against the arrest of the foreign reporters.
